doc:
Brooke Langton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brooke_Langton 0 Brooke Langton (born November 27, 1970) is an American actress. She is best known for the role of Samantha Reilly in the Fox prime time soap opera, Melrose Place from 1996 to 1998. Langton later had the leading role in the short-lived USA Network drama series, The Net (1998–99), and was the female lead in the 2000 comedy film The Replacements. Brooke_Langton ( born November_27_,_1970 ) is an_American_actress . She is_best_known for the_role of Samantha_Reilly in the_Fox_prime_time_soap_opera , Melrose_Place from 1996 to 1998 . Langton later had the_leading_role in the_short-lived_USA_Network_drama_series , The_Net_(_1998 – 99_) , and was the_female_lead in the_2000_comedy_film The_Replacements .
